page.title: 09CLUBS & ORGANISATIONS, SEND
page.content: The following clubs cater for a variety of interests in Send and the surrounding area. In Send two halls are available for village use. For young children, there is the Little Owl Nursery School. There is a Brownie and a Guide Pack, a Cub and a Scout Troop. Send Amateur Dramatic Society (SADS) performs several productions each year. Dancing tuition is available for children in the village. The following{clubs and organisations are also active: Bridge Club, British Legion, History Society (10th Anniver- sary 1985), Horticultural Society, Old Time Dancing, Over 60's Club and the Women's Institute. There is also an active branch of the Leukemia Research Charity group. The nearest theatres and cinemas, with 5 screens in total, are in Woking (5km) and Guildford (9km).
